title: 旧约 - 创世记(Genesis) - 第 20 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 创世记(Genesis) -- 第 20 章 ( 本篇共有 50 章 )

lineList.en: And Abraham journeyed from thence toward the south country, and dwelled between Kadesh and Shur, and sojourned in Gerar.
lineList.cn: 亚伯拉罕从那里向南地迁去，寄居在加低斯和书珥中间的基拉耳。

lineList.en: And Abraham said of Sarah his wife, She is my sister: and Abimelech king of Gerar sent, and took Sarah.
lineList.cn: 亚伯拉罕称他的妻撒拉为妹子，基拉耳王亚比米勒差人把撒拉取了去。

lineList.en: But God came to Abimelech in a dream by night, and said to him, Behold, thou art but a dead man, for the woman which thou hast taken; for she is a man's wife.
lineList.cn: 但夜间神来在梦中对亚比米勒说，你是个死人哪，因为你取了那女人来。她原是别人的妻子。

lineList.en: But Abimelech had not come near her: and he said, LORD, wilt thou slay also a righteous nation?
lineList.cn: 亚比米勒却还没有亲近撒拉。他说，主阿，连有义的国，你也要毁灭吗。

lineList.en: Said he not unto me, She is my sister? and she, even she herself said, He is my brother: in the integrity of my heart and innocency of my hands have I done this.
lineList.cn: 那人岂不是自己对我说，她是我的妹子吗。就是女人也自己说，他是我的哥哥。我作这事是心正手洁的。

lineList.en: And God said unto him in a dream, Yea, I know that thou didst this in the integrity of thy heart; for I also withheld thee from sinning against me: therefore suffered I thee not to touch her.
lineList.cn: 神在梦中对他说，我知道你作这事是心中正直。我也拦阻了你，免得你得罪我，所以我不容你沾着她。

lineList.en: Now therefore restore the man his wife; for he is a prophet, and he shall pray for thee, and thou shalt live: and if thou restore her not, know thou that thou shalt surely die, thou, and all that are thine.
lineList.cn: 现在你把这人的妻子归还他。因为他是先知，他要为你祷告，使你存活。你若不归还他，你当知道，你和你所有的人都必要死。

lineList.en: Therefore Abimelech rose early in the morning, and called all his servants, and told all these things in their ears: and the men were sore afraid.
lineList.cn: 亚比米勒清早起来，召了众臣仆来，将这些事都说给他们听，他们都甚惧怕。

lineList.en: Then Abimelech called Abraham, and said unto him, What hast thou done unto us? and what have I offended thee, that thou hast brought on me and on my kingdom a great sin? thou hast done deeds unto me that ought not to be done.
lineList.cn: 亚比米勒召了亚伯拉罕来，对他说，你怎吗向我这样行呢。我在什么事上得罪了你，你竟使我和我国里的人陷在大罪里。你向我行不当行的事了。

lineList.en: And Abimelech said unto Abraham, What sawest thou, that thou hast done this thing?
lineList.cn: 亚比米勒又对亚伯拉罕说，你见了什么才作这事呢。

lineList.en: And Abraham said, Because I thought, Surely the fear of God is not in this place; and they will slay me for my wife's sake.
lineList.cn: 亚伯拉罕说，我以为这地方的人总不惧怕神，必为我妻子的缘故杀我。

lineList.en: And yet indeed she is my sister; she is the daughter of my father, but not the daughter of my mother; and she became my wife.
lineList.cn: 况且她也实在是我的妹子。她与我是同父异母，后来作了我的妻子。

lineList.en: And it came to pass, when God caused me to wander from my father's house, that I said unto her, This is thy kindness which thou shalt shew unto me; at every place whither we shall come, say of me, He is my brother.
lineList.cn: 当神叫我离开父家，飘流在外的时候，我对她说，我们无论走到什么地方，你可

lineList.en: And Abimelech took sheep, and oxen, and menservants, and womenservants, and gave them unto Abraham, and restored him Sarah his wife.
lineList.cn: 亚比米勒把牛，羊，仆婢赐给亚伯拉罕，又把他的妻子撒拉归还他。

lineList.en: And Abimelech said, Behold, my land is before thee: dwell where it pleaseth thee.
lineList.cn: 亚比米勒又说，看哪，我的地都在你面前，你可以随意居住。

lineList.en: And unto Sarah he said, Behold, I have given thy brother a thousand pieces of silver: behold, he is to thee a covering of the eyes, unto all that are with thee, and with all other: thus she was reproved.
lineList.cn: 又对撒拉说，我给你哥哥一千银子，作为你在合家人面前哨羞的（羞原文作眼），你就在众人面前没有不是了。

lineList.en: So Abraham prayed unto God: and God healed Abimelech, and his wife, and his maidservants; and they bare children.
lineList.cn: 亚伯拉罕祷告神，神就医好了亚比米勒和他的妻子，并他的众女仆，她们便跑生育

lineList.en: For the LORD had fast closed up all the wombs of the house of Abimelech, because of Sarah Abraham's wife.
lineList.cn: 因耶和华为亚伯拉罕的妻子撒拉的缘故，已经使亚比米勒家中的妇人不能生育。
